artist: Printer: John Corner; Painter: After Abraham Willaerts; Engraver: Conrad Waumans; Publisher: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London
description: half length portrait of Jan Both facing left, looking at viewer, holding cloak; in a rectangular frame; small landscape below portrait
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on sheet in black: [JOHN BOTH/ Willers pinxit  Corner Inc\'t/ Published for the Proprietor, according to the Act of Parliament, Jan\'y 1, 1816/ by Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme & Brown; & Lackington, Allen, &Co./ London]
title: Portrait of John Both
